question: [File: aptos-core/storage/aptosdb/src/restore/restore_handler.rs] [Function: reset_state_store()] [Concurrent Access] At line 59, if reset() is called while other operations are accessing state_store, can this cause data races or leave the database in an inconsistent state? (Critical)
